mapper.sql: p.promotion_id, p.flight_id, p.title, p.passenger_count, p.discount_percentage, p.cabin_class_code, p.tags, p.is_active, p.display_order, p.created_at, p.updated_at, p.created_by, f.flight_number, f.departure_airport, f.arrival_airport, dep.city AS departure_airport_name, arr.city AS arrival_airport_name, arr.image_url AS arrival_airport_image_url al.airline_name, f.departure_time, f.arrival_time, fsp.current_price

FROM promotion p JOIN flight f ON p.flight_id = f.flight_id LEFT JOIN airline al ON f.airline_id = al.airline_id LEFT JOIN airport dep ON f.departure_airport = dep.airport_id LEFT JOIN airport arr ON f.arrival_airport = arr.airport_id LEFT JOIN flight_seat_price fsp ON p.flight_id = fsp.flight_id AND p.cabin_class_code = fsp.cabin_class_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO promotion( promotion_id, flight_id, title, passenger_count, discount_percentage, cabin_class_code, tags, is_active, display_order, created_by, created_at ) VALUES ( #{promotionId}, #{flightId}, #{title}, #{passengerCount}, #{discountPercentage}, #{cabinClassCode}, #{tags}, #{isActive}, #{displayOrder}, #{createdBy}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE promotion SET flight_id = #{flightId}, title = #{title}, passenger_count = #{passengerCount}, discount_percentage = #{discountPercentage}, tags = #{tags}, is_active = #{isActive}, display_order = #{displayOrder} WHERE promotion_id = #{promotionId}
UPDATE promotion SET is_active = #{isActive} WHERE promotion_id = #{promotionId}
UPDATE promotion SET display_order = #{displayOrder} WHERE promotion_id = #{promotionId}
mapper.select:
SELECT
WHERE p.is_active = 'Y' ORDER BY p.display_order ASC, p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
